channel.title: Web Client Error!
channel.description:
i have made a webclient, steps jar'd it and signed it and done html code thingy but i get this error when i try and play my server on my webclient
EDIT: i figured out that i put the wrong url for the dropbox for everyone who gets the same error
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/269/webclienterror.jpg/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/3905/webclienterror.jpg[/img][/URL]
